Public NotInheritable Class SoapServerTlb Implements ISoapServerTlb

Docs.summary: Processes authenticated, encrypted SOAP components on servers. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.SoapServerTlb> is used internally by the .NET Framework. You do not need to use it directly in your code.
